name: Hoarder's Nightmare
description: THE WORLD IS GOING INTO CHAOS BECAUSE OF A PANDEMIC AND THERE WILL BE A LOCKDOWN VERY SOON. YOU AS A PROFESSIONAL HOARDER NEED TO HOARD ESSENTIAL ITEMS, SPECIFICALLY THE TOILET ROLLS, AND DON'T LET ANYONE TAKE IT. AVOID, FIGHT WITH OTHER CUSTOMERS AND TAKE WHAT IS(OR WILL BE) YOURS. YOU HAVE TO GRAB A SHOPPING CART TO COLLECT TOILET ROLLS THEN CARRY IT OUT TO YOUR PICKUP TRUCK AND DROP ALL COLLECTED ROLLS, THEN GO INSIDE AND BRING MORE. YOUR SCORE WILL BE THE TOTAL ROLLS YOU STORED IN YOUR TRUCK BEFORE THE SUPERMARKET CLOSES DOWN, WHICH IS IN 6 MINS.
